Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.199926694 0.909624851 0.944443017 0.842354781 0.431522910 0.404544851
#>  [7] 0.810911668 0.920733237 0.849532985 0.002564221 0.736615111 0.522767226
#> [13] 0.708845941 0.815261158 0.252229444 0.470180608 0.789131640 0.061963240
#> [19] 0.277773613 0.992130066
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.031961172 0.656704788 0.739040384 0.656237607 0.152737047 0.129992439
#>  [7] 0.107915281 0.996079929 0.777624056 0.603068155 0.003933106 0.719044926
#> [13] 0.502520044 0.192407405 0.192185629 0.423806913 0.199053797 0.080034364
#> [19] 0.522432952 0.336328714

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.81421146 0.15098335 0.36824333 0.61090665 0.08378969 0.56597625
#>  [7] 0.57713429 0.14572472 0.83715617 0.28460664
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.6496025638 0.5389463615 0.3927402098 0.8474947689 0.0004128644
#>  [6] 0.2210154126 0.0369768508 0.3038044535 0.9111418079 0.3489898578
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.9989875 0.9856678 0.3160896 0.6565526 0.5468702 0.7691972 0.3185181
#>  [8] 0.6847715 0.7277123 0.6262075

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.1719804 0.7613824 0.2580143 0.9828835 0.2086870
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.77655322 0.08130901 0.74860995 0.69634645 0.59935816
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.64822520 0.09494672 0.79034502 0.47346647 0.51559849
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.22852770 0.17407458 0.07590956 0.10878322 0.14853005

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.09312891 0.40493820 0.36768208 0.34712266 0.44574252
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5091146 0.5185155 0.5887749 0.5222683 0.2846297
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.7421886 0.7201576 0.4966030 0.4163809 0.7200063
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.9454010 0.6731754 0.7228119 0.3156267 0.9901989

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6802108 0.9520117 0.5450179 0.8515869 0.3422098
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5780873 0.7023040 0.1967045 0.5637154 0.3455095
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.6345969 0.3196292 0.8003595 0.3083567 0.7708970
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.457160729 0.971384308 0.403983583 0.234323029 0.001481918

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.0         2.2          4.0         1.0 versicolor
#> 2          6.7         2.5          5.8         1.8  virginica
#> 3          5.7         2.6          3.5         1.0 versicolor
#> 4          6.8         3.0          5.5         2.1  virginica
#> 5          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width   Species
#> 1          5.0         3.5          1.3         0.3    setosa
#> 2          6.1         2.6          5.6         1.4 virginica
#> 3          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2    setosa
#> 4          6.0         2.2          5.0         1.5 virginica
#> 5          5.7         4.4          1.5         0.4    setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.8         3.0          5.5         2.1  virginica
#> 2          6.4         3.2          5.3         2.3  virginica
#> 3          5.0         3.3          1.4         0.2     setosa
#> 4          7.7         2.8          6.7         2.0  virginica
#> 5          6.1         3.0          4.6         1.4 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           5.2         2.7
#> 2           6.4         3.1
#> 3           5.7         2.5
#> 4           6.5         3.2
#> 5           6.1         3.0
#> 6           5.5         2.5
#> 7           7.9         3.8
#> 8           6.7         3.0
#> 9           6.0         3.4
#> 10          5.7         4.4
#> 11          5.9         3.0
#> 12          4.9         3.1
#> 13          5.8         2.7
#> 14          7.7         3.8
#> 15          5.8         2.8
#> 16          6.0         3.0
#> 17          7.0         3.2
#> 18          5.1         3.7
#> 19          5.0         3.6
#> 20          6.9         3.2

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.0         3.5
#> 2          5.6         3.0
#> 3          5.6         2.7
#> 4          6.7         3.0
#> 5          4.5         2.3
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.9         3.2
#> 2          4.9         2.5
#> 3          6.7         3.0
#> 4          5.6         3.0
#> 5          5.1         2.5
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.4         2.8
#> 2          4.9         3.6
#> 3          5.1         3.5
#> 4          7.0         3.2
#> 5          5.1         3.4
